articles.author: Kyle Barr
articles.title: Would You Use a Mouse With a Fake ‘Click?’ - Gizmodo
articles.description: Logitech’s new ultra-customizable gamer mouse doesn't feel like anything else.
articles.content: Logitechs race to offer an esports mouse with the fastest response time has led us to a mouse that’s completely different than any I’ve used before. Mice have relied on the same type of microswitches… [+3678 chars]

articles.title: Google announces massive expansion of AI features in Chrome - Ars Technica
articles.description: Chrome’s future as an AI browser starts today.
